definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: The firm closed business for the time of the holiday.
Part 4 legal systems of trademark and tradename in other countries and areas.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分其他国家或地区关于商标与商号的法律制度。

sentences.english: We're member of the Hong Kong Tourist Association.
sentences.chinese: 我们是香港旅游协会的会员商号。

sentences.english: Our firm is represented in India and Pakistan by Mr. Hall.
sentences.chinese: 本商号在印度和巴基斯坦的代表是贺尔先生。

sentences.english: Many firms went bung in the panic .
sentences.chinese: 许多商号在这场经济恐慌中破产了。

sentences.english: The directors have decided to merge the two small firms together.
sentences.chinese: 董事们已决定把这两家小商号归并起来。

sentences.english: Heshun is honored with the oldest international business brand in Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 和顺拥有云南最古老的跨国商号。

sentences.english: The converged commercial firms daring Daoguang years were estimated to eight or nine hundreds, or even to one thousand.
sentences.chinese: 道光年间汇聚周村的商人商号可达八九百家乃至千家。

sentences.english: Three companies were amalgamated into a corporation.
sentences.chinese: 三家商号被合并成一家公司。

sentences.english: I believe you will profit by confining your offer to a limited number of firms.
sentences.chinese: 我相信贵公司将报盘集中于少数几家商号是有益的。

sentences.english: She castigated the tax on gifts and bequests as a threat to small business.
sentences.chinese: 她把对礼物和遗赠物征税斥之为对小商号的一种威胁。

sentences.english: This company and that firm should be closely brigaded.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司和那家商号应密切结合。

sentences.english: The partnership will be discontinued owing to the retirement of Mr. Yokoi.
sentences.chinese: 由于横井先生退休，该商号将不再继续营业。

sentences.english: The company has connections with a number of Japanese firms.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司与几家日本商号有业务往来。

sentences.english: Their firm will be amalgamated with an American company.
sentences.chinese: 他们商号将与一家美国公司合并。

sentences.english: At present, there is no special system for the legal protection on trade names.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我国还没有建立起专门的商号权法律保护制度。

definition: money farm (dealing in illegal foreign currency of money laundering)
